metadata.title: CVE-2012-2125 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS for NVIDIA BlueField (jammy) - low
metadata.description:
RubyGems before 1.8.23 can redirect HTTPS connections to HTTP, which makesit easier for remote attackers to observe or modify a gem duringinstallation via a man-in-the-middle attack.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2012-2125` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

bundler - 2.2.5-2
ruby-bundler - 2.2.5-2
ruby-rubygems - 3.2.5-2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: rubygems package in jammy, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.2.5-2').
